sub_title: PHD Researcher at Radboud University Nijmegen
summary: PhD-candidate Anthropology and Development, Radboud University Nijmegen. Research on extractives and land rights advocacy; relations between civil society, social movements, communities, business and government in Coastal Kenya (Kilifi/Kwale) in processes of mining dispossession and its environmental effects. I have an interdisciplinary background in International Relations, Conflict Studies and Human Rights, Anthropology and Development Studies. In my research, I (try to) mix qualitative and quantitative research. And also research results with a bit of empathy. I make photographs too and with 7 years of experience in journalism, I love visual/narrative representations of research.

volunteer_experiences: [{'date': {'start': {'month': 9, 'day': None, 'year': 2003}, 'end': {'month': 4, 'day': None, 'year': 2004}}, 'role': 'Participant Exchange program Bhutan - Netherlands', 'company': {'id': None, 'name': 'stichting oikos', 'logo': None, 'url': None}, 'cause': 'ECONOMIC_EMPOWERMENT', 'description': 'I participated in a 6 months exchange program between Bhutan and the Netherlands. With a mixed group of Dutch and Bhutanese, we were stationed first 3 months in Bhutan, followed by 3 months in the Netherlands. In Bhutan, I volunteered at a school and we traveled through the country to give presentations on sustainability and economic empowerment. In the Netherlands, together with my 2 Bhutanese counterparts, I volunteered at Omrop Fryslan and we gave presentations at schools as well. This program gave us many intercultural skills, and ofcourse it was a great opportunity to be part of Bhutan for three months. What I liked especially was the reciprocity: instead westerners only travel to the South, this time the Bhutanese had the chance to go to the Netherlands as well. '}, {'date': {'start': {'month': 11, 'day': None, 'year': 2015}, 'end': {'month': 12, 'day': None, 'year': 2015}}, 'role': 'Assistant', 'company': {'id': None, 'name': 'Stichting Pato', 'logo': None, 'url': None}, 'cause': None, 'description': 'Stichting Pato was founded by my father.
